definition: honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: One day, the dog fell sick and the donor asked She Li Zhi to recites sutra for it.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，母狗生病了，施主請舍利子尊者給它誦經。

sentences.english: The Venerable Ananda could only provide such answer and bid Farwell.
sentences.chinese: 尊者阿難只能做這樣的迴應，就告辭了。

sentences.english: This dhamma desana of Than Acharn Maha Boowa is a rare and special one.
sentences.chinese: 尊者阿姜摩訶布瓦這次的宣講是稀有罕見特別的一次。

sentences.english: After making this decision, on that very night, he experienced a vision of Vajra Nairatmya.
sentences.chinese: 就在已如此決定後的當晚，尊者現見了金剛無我姆。

sentences.english: For the benefit of Krishnapa, he gave the teaching known as "Vajra Words."
sentences.chinese: 爲利益前者，尊者傳授了“金剛語”的教法。

sentences.english: You can play the the recording and follow Bhante's recitation in front of Buddha statue to take precepts.
sentences.chinese: 播放後自己可以在佛像前跟着尊者念戒，以求得戒體。

sentences.english: Yelu Arhat's disciples had sharp heaven eyes.
sentences.chinese: 耶律尊者的弟子天眼銳利。

sentences.english: Every night for six nights, one after another, he attained great realizations.
sentences.chinese: 此後連續六夜，尊者得到了殊勝證悟。

sentences.english: Ven. Rahula, bowing down to the Blessed One, sat to one side.
sentences.chinese: 尊者羅睺羅向薄伽梵頂禮後，坐於一邊。

sentences.english: At that time venerable Brahmadeva's mother, a Brahmin woman was steadfastly making adoration to Brahma with out stretched arms.
sentences.chinese: 五其時，尊者梵天之母婆羅門女，常以供牲供梵天。

sentences.english: Not self-sustaining as the Venerable, superior, and away from employees, from the masses.
sentences.chinese: 不能自持爲尊者，高人一等，而遠離員工，脫離羣衆。

sentences.english: Such was the Venerable Acharn's instruction regarding love.
sentences.chinese: 這就是尊者阿迦曼有關愛情的開示。

sentences.english: On one occasion Ven. Ananda was staying near Savatthi in Jeta's Grove, Anathapindika's monastery.
sentences.chinese: 一時，尊者阿難住在舍衛城附近的祇樹給孤獨精舍。

definition: Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
to keep the law/to protect Buddha's teachings/protector of Buddhist law (i.e. temple donor)
elder/term of respect for a Buddhist monk
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
head of a clan/natural leader/person of prestige and authority in a domain/suzerain
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
